text: (died January 1, 2002) was a Japanese actress. She was born in Inawashiro, Fukushima. From 1942 to 1975, she was married to Olympian Masanori Yusa. Aizome retired in 1965. Her best known roles were in Dragnet Girl (1933), Japanese Girls at the Harbor (1933), A Mother Should be Loved (1934), Our Neighbor, Miss Yae (1934), A Ball at the Anjo House (1947) and in Kiri no Hata (1965). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1915 births Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese centenarians Category:2002 deaths Category:People from Fukushima Prefecture Category:Silent movie actors Category:Stage names
title: Yumeko Aizome
